thread.title: Tories pledge money for transport, housing and energy
thread.title_full: Tories pledge money for transport, housing and energy - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Tories pledge money for transport, housing and energy
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device
Tories pledge money for transport, housing and energy 5 October 2015 Last updated at 06:59 BST
The Conservative government has said it will set up a new independent body designed to speed up major transport, housing and energy projects, to be chaired by former Labour minister Lord Adonis.
Chancellor George Osborne is to announce at the Tory Party conference that an extra Â£5bn will be spent on various infrastructure projects.
Carole Walker reports.
